TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TabControlEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the and events of a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.Action%2A> property to determine which event is occurring. This enables you to handle multiple event types with one event handler.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A> properties to determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> the event is occurring for.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> event. This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> named `TabControl1`. Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> event.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#558](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.t_29_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#558](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.t_29_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: public TabControlEventArgs (System.Windows.Forms.TabPage tabPage, int tabPageIndex, System.Windows.Forms.TabControlAction action);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Forms.TabPage tabPage, int32 tabPageIndex, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TabControlAction action) cil managed

Docs.param: The the event is occurring for.
The zero-based index of `tabPage` in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The property values of the newly created instance are initialized to the specified parameter values.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating which event is occurring.
